General.Name: Ratu Prabu Energi Tbk
General.Description: PT. Ratu Prabu Energi, Tbk, through its subsidiaries, provides oil and gas services in Indonesia. It offers tubular, casing, and tubing inspection and maintenance services for mining companies; maintenance services for oil and gas wells, as well as rents heavy equipment for hydraulic workover and snubbing units; and inspection services for oil and gas companies. The company also provides labor services in supporting the exploration, drilling, and production of oil and gas. In addition, it owns and rents office building. The company was formerly known as PT. Arona Binasejati Tbk and changed its name to PT. Ratu Prabu Energi Tbk in June 2008. PT. Ratu Prabu Energi, Tbk was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Ratu Prabu 1 Building, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12560
